Classify the company as 'Yes' (investable tech startup) or 'No' for VCs based on its description. Reply only with 'Yes' or 'No'. 

Guidelines: 

Yes: 

    High-growth potential in tech sectors (fintech, healthtech, AI, SaaS, enterprise solutions, etc.)
    Revenue models: subscription, SaaS, marketplaces with fees, monetizable platforms
    Global/large regional reach
    Innovative tech/business models disrupting industries or creating new markets
    Hardware products with large market potential and advanced technology
     

No: 

    Investment firms (inclucing VCs), consultancies, accelerators, large corporations, small traditional businesses, boutiques, advisoriry.
    Limited scalability industries (cannabis, local services, niche markets)
    Unclear business models or limited revenue potential
    Capital-intensive projects or asset management
    Localized focus without expansion options
    Traditional industries without significant innovation
    People-intensive services
    Beverage producers, cannabis/drug industry, gaming studios, NFT creators/sellers
     

Note: Stealth mode startups can be 'Yes' or 'No' based on potential and industry focus. 


Here are some examples as a reference:
Description: Nordam Business Partners is a consulting firm that focuses on sales process services for businesses.
Label: No; 
Description: Seahouse Capital offers capital raising, capital structure, IPO law, communication, and share issues services.
Label: No; 
Description: Propstep is an end-to-end platform for long-term rentals
Label: Yes; 
Description: DRIVE beta is a media production company that produces and develops video content on the web, moving images, and content distribution.
Label: No; 
Description: Developer of a business productivity software intended to provide supply chain management. The company's platform is specialized in offering a B2B marketplace for the manufacturing and industrial sector that can save time and money by optimizing their entire procurement operations, enabling clients to solve complex business problem through their software.
Label: Yes; 
Description: Spruce Up is a digital boutique powered by AI that curates a personalized boutique of high-quality, everyday luxury items for your home.
Label: No

Description: AZM X is a Saudi emerging company specialized in the #DigitalExperience space. A subsidiary of Saudi Azm.  \nعزم اكس شركة سعودية متخصصة في تحسين تجربة المستخدم #الرقمية. احدى شركات عزم السعودية
Label: No

Description: At Series, we help students unlock their entrepreneurial potential by building curated timelines to help them achieve their vision. We also created V.E.R.A. to guide them on this process, the first AI Mentor with a real, human network.

Vera can brainstorm GTM ideas, connect users with investors, source technical developers, set up events on college campuses, and much more.

We're building a new era of entrepreneurship - where anyone can build anything, at anytime.

- built by students, for students
Label: Yes

Description: ReSeed brings carbon credits directly from farmers to the market. 
We are an end-to-end  platform that incentivizes farmers to protect and remove carbon. Our unique business partnership with farmers helps combat climate change at scale.

We believe that:
  - there is still a viable window of time to solve the climate crisis. 
  - market forces can inspire billions of people and companies to participate in reversing climate change. 
  - an auditable, transparent and trustworthy data ecosystem is critical to make these changes happen.

Our vision is that soon, growing food will be recognized as essential to restoring the  ecosystems that sustain us; farmers’ contributions to the health of the planet will be justly valued, and climate change can be stopped and reversed.
Label: Yes

Description: Concenter BioPharma - a patented, unique, proven, novel platform of drugs with 3 modes of action.

We are advancing a pipeline of products that demonstrate vast potential in addressing multi­billion markets for treating a range of diseases (that require common MoA’s – our Platform). 

We  will become a global specialty biopharmaceutical company focused on people and providing innovative therapies for them.

Our Platform will enable us to jump quickly from one product to another without having to rediscover and recreate an underlying technology for each product. 

we are committed to developing and delivering therapies that work harmoniously with the human body and advance the treatment landscape for people living with life-threatening diseases.

Description: At Loiale, our mission is to revolutionize customer loyalty programs by offering brands the ultimate software solution to boost retention, increase customer engagement, and foster deep loyalty. Our cutting-edge platform seamlessly adapts to your business, enabling you to create personalized, data-driven experiences that convert every customer into a loyal advocate. With Loiale, brands can ditch cumbersome, outdated loyalty methods and fully harness the power of gamification and analytics to drive brand love.

Struggling with traditional generalist loyalty programs that don't deliver results? Loiale is a next-generation customer loyalty platform that offers fully customizable rewards programs, gamification, and insightful analytics. It empowers brands to engage customers like never before by delivering personalized rewards powered by AI, simplifying program management, and providing complete control over customer data in one easy-to-use dashboard.

Achieve unparalleled customer loyalty and retention with Loiale:

• Increase spending: Program members spend up to 7.2x more than non-members.
• Attract more customers: A recent Coffee & Bakery brand attracted over 10,000 customers in just 40 days.
• Boost monthly spending: Existing customers increased their monthly spending by 45% after joining.
• Personalize rewards: Tailor every reward to individual customers' preferences and behaviors powered by AI.
• Optimize data management: Access complete customer insights, program performance metrics, and manage your loyalty program effortlessly.

Empower your brand with best-in-class technology. Request a demo now!
Label: Yes

    High-growth potential in tech sectors (fintech, healthtech, AI, SaaS, enterprise solutions, etc.)

No:

    Capital-intensive projects or asset management
    Localized focus without expansion options
    Traditional industries without significant innovation
    People-intensive services
    Beverage producers, cannabis/drug industry, gaming studios, NFT creators/sellers
     

Note: Stealth mode startups can be 'Yes' or 'No' based on potential and industry focus.

Description: Mission: Our mission is to rebuild the backbone of American business, with veterans. The workforce for hard-tech sectors critical to our national security needs to be rebuilt. We believe veterans are the ideal labor force to form the backbone around which we can rebuild.

Further, we believe that our military should be one of the primary and premium sources of talent for employers. So we are building a Talent SmartGrid™ to enable our nation to better leverage our human resources. 

Background: Headlamp serves two sides, veterans and employers, and partners with the veteran transition ecosystem.

For veterans, Headlamp is a Veteran Transition Accelerator that helps them execute their transition plans. We enable veterans to explore roles that fit their skills and interests, then work with employers to create opportunities.

For employers, our primary product is SkillBridge-as-a-Service (SBaaS), powered by Career Liaison Officers (CLNOs) to provide employers with “white-glove” access to select veteran talent under the Department of Defense (DOD) SkillBridge program. 

We are also developing Workforce by Headlamp, which enables employers to leverage SBaaS to build a pipeline of talent, trained to their standards. Our initial effort is with the Chips and Science Act, for a semiconductor workforce.

We help employers answer:
What are the critical initiatives in your organization? 
How could service members and veterans help drive results/impact? 
What are your priority roles that are a best fit for veterans?

What is DOD SkillBridge? SkillBridge is a congressionally mandated, DOD program that enables veterans to leave their place of duty up to 180 days early to work and learn at a place of potential future employment. Participating veterans continue to receive their full pay and benefits.

Headlamp’s services are available to employers in a subscription model.
to contact us at bizdev@myheadlamp.com.
Label: Yes

Description: BulkSource powers material producers with smarter, more efficient solutions designed for the unique challenges of the aggregate and vertically integrated asphalt industries. Our platform provides advanced tools for Data Management, Material Sales, Site Operations, and Financial Operations, enabling producers to streamline processes, improve operational control, and drive profitability.

Founded by Greg Dangler, former CEO of a quarry and material hauling business, alongside Patrick Stewart and Craig Holman, BulkSource was born out of a deep understanding of the industry's needs. With years of experience in material production and operations, they set out to provide modern, affordable technology solutions that simplify workflows, reduce administrative burdens, and help businesses grow with minimal IT overhead.

At BulkSource, our focus is on helping companies operate more effectively, with cutting-edge tools that integrate seamlessly into existing operations. We pride ourselves on offering low-cost implementations, exceptional customer support, and a product roadmap driven by customer needs, ensuring our partners can achieve their operational goals with ease.

Description: Why are construction projects plagued with change orders and delays?
The answer is, most construction documents are not "fabrication-ready", and aren't even intended to be. They are what is termed "Level of Development 300" which is that only the general shapes and sizes of the building elements are resolved.

The intent of designers and engineers is that the General Contractor will complete the documents by the use of shop drawings, layout drawings, and will do the clash detection and coordination to make all the parts and pieces of the building fit together. This is termed "Level of Development 400" and is ready for a tradesperson to begin fabricating the building

This is where we come in. We occupy that space between design and construction using our extensive background as Architects, construction experts and BIM modelers to create a complete, accurate and constructible model of the building, where all the clashes and errors are resolved, ready to build.

Our goal is, quite immodestly, to eradicate change orders and delays
Label: No

Description: Fixated is not here to blend in or maintain the status quo. We are here to create and lead the new era in digital entertainment. 

Let’s be clear from jump. This isn’t just a new company. This is a mission to build a new industry and give everyone in digital ecosystem what they actually need and want. Everything in the space has changed. Too many people pretending like it’s same ol’ same ol’. Stop calling creators influencers.

Start seeing them as studios and supporting that ambition. Stop pretending like today’s the most engaging games aren’t being created by those who sat in the audience just two years ago. Fortnite and Roblox has made everyone into a game developer.

In launching Fixated we are building a new industry and putting a mirror in front of the old one. How dare we question what’s come before us? How dare you not?? We are building an ecosystem fueled by our love for creating games, content and for turning the most ambitious creators into household names. It’s time to change everything. It’s time to get Fixated!!

Description: PetPax Co. offers supplements for pets delivered on a dissolvable film strip to pets. We envision access to high quality OTC vitamins and nutraceuticals  for pets through a variety of easy to use high absorption products. 

Our delivery method, the Oral Thin Film (OTF), allows dogs a meaningful alternative to difficult-to-swallow pills and other tedious regiments.

Our product are easier to transport and more stable than pills so they provide our customers with the advantage of convenience. They do not require the use of water to take as they dissolve in the mouth upon contact with saliva. 

Our first product to market, the "ZenMelt" provides fast-acting anxiety relief to dogs as it absorbs directly into the blood stream requiring a lower dose but delivering a higher impact. Packed with 4 potent all natural ingredients it is specially formulated and delivered to achieve higher bioavailability in the body and speedy absorption.

Description: At Conexo Casa, (Spanish for “Connected Home”), we are building a community, supported by simple to use technology, focused on allowing the elderly, those suffering with dementia or other neurological disorders, and the disabled to live safely and securely in their homes for as long as possible.
Conexo Casa
Connecting People for Independent Living
We connect families, medical resources, care providers, and volunteers with our clients so that they can remotely check in on our client’s health and safety, talk, provide emotional support, and more.
We empower our clients to extend their ability to live at home and maintain their independence for as long as safely possible.
Modern technology is not as accessible to those with dementia, the elderly or those with disabilities. Using “apps”, navigating “the web”, managing home automation, and learning new ways of doing things is daunting for these clients.
But there are ways to make this technology work better and seamlessly integrate it into their lives.
Start with people and their needs.
What are the things our clients need to accomplish in order to maintain independent living?
Who do our clients need to interact with in order to manage their daily lives?
Where do our clients live and where are the resources they need?
We answer all of these questions and offer a customized configuration of standardized technology, suited to the needs and capabilities of our clients.
Train our clients, their families, care givers, and others on how to use the tools
Install the tools at our client’s home.
Provide on-going support
Coordinate volunteers to provide virtual support, daily check in calls, and remote status monitoring
Label: No

Description: We're on a mission to feed every worker in America.

How? Sharebite is the leading meal benefits platform built exclusively for companies to feed employees. We offer multiple products to meet the needs of every type of workplace - in-office, remote, and hybrid.  Meal benefits are proven to fuel performance, foster culture, and make employees feel supported.

For every meal ordered on Sharebite’s platform, a meal is donated to combat food insecurity via our partnerships with Feeding America® and City Harvest. To date, over 9 million meals have been donated.

Sharebite has been recognized by Inc.’s Best in Business in 2021, 2022, and 2023,  Fast Company's 2023 World Changing Ideas, Crain's New York Business Best Place to Work in 2021 and 2022, and as a finalist for the U.S. Chamber of Commerce Foundation's Citizens Awards for companies operating as a force for good.

Description: Créé en fin 2023, Smart Bees est un cabinet de conseil data & analytics spécialisé dans l'exploitation de la donnée propriétaire au service du marketing. Nous nous appuyons sur une triple expertise :
1. Mesure : comment mettre en place un dispositif de collecte de données riche et fiable sur site web ou application mobile ? Notamment avec l'apparition du server-side
2. Architecture data : comment centraliser l'ensemble de vos sources de données (CRM, navigation, transactionnelle, offline ...) dans une architecture data marketing pérenne ?
3. Exploitation : comment exploiter toute la puissance de vos données à travers des segmentations, scoring, machine learning, dans votre stratégie marketing afin d'améliorer vos performances ?
Au vu de l'état de l'écosystème, qui souffre de plus en plus des mises à jour d'Apple (ITP, ATT), de la fin des cookies actée pour 2024, des différentes réglementations (RGPD, CNIL etc.), nous avons opté pour une meilleure exploitation des données (notamment propriétaires!). L'objectif : booster les performances marketing de nos clients ! On est le cabinet de conseil qui permet une meilleure collecte de la donnée et exploitation de la donnée pour des use cases précis. C’est pour cette raison qu’on a monté Smart Bees, pour appréhender auprès de nos clients les défis du marketing digital et de nos écosystèmes changeants ! Au-delà de la gestion de ces expertises, nous travaillons sur une technologie propriétaire (une mini Customer Data Platform, ça vous parle ?) ! Si vous voulez en savoir plus et peut être gagner un atelier sur l'exploitation de vos données propriétaires, n'hésitez pas à contacter Gauthier Haicault ou Pierre Henry. Vous pouvez aussi nous retrouver sur notre site : https://www.smart-bees.fr/
Label: No

Description: FastWay nasce nel 2022 con la missione di accelerare la decarbonizzazione e la transizione verso la mobilità sostenibile grazie allo sviluppo di una rete di ricarica per veicoli elettrici fast e ultra-fast diffusa su tutto il territorio nazionale. Con la solidità del Fondo Infrastrutture per la Crescita–ESG (IPC) di Azimut Libera Impresa Sgr e la freschezza di un team giovane e dinamico, FastWay garantisce un servizio affidabile, professionale e tecnologicamente all’avanguardia per tutti gli stakeholders pubblici e privati che vogliono farsi promotori della mobilità del futuro.

MISSION
Noi di FastWay, con orgoglio e passione italiana, ci impegniamo ad accelerare la decarbonizzazione e la transizione verso un futuro sostenibile attraverso soluzioni d'avanguardia per la mobilità elettrica: lo sviluppo di reti di ricarica diffusa Fast e Ultra-Fast. Aspiriamo a connettere le comunità, a ridurre l'impatto ambientale e a rendere la mobilità elettrica una scelta semplice e conveniente per tutti, garantendo un servizio rapido, efficiente e accessibile in ogni angolo del nostro Paese. Con tenacia e innovazione, guidiamo l'Italia verso un futuro verde e connesso.

VISION
Immaginiamo un'Italia dove la mobilità elettrica si fonde perfettamente con il ritmo della vita quotidiana, in cui ogni strada e ogni angolo del nostro Paese è un punto di connessione verso un futuro più pulito, attraverso la nostra rete di 15.000 punti di ricarica veloce. Guardando avanti, vediamo un'infrastruttura di ricarica così avanzata e capillare da rendere la transizione all'elettrico non solo una scelta ovvia, ma un diritto di ogni cittadino. In FastWay, sogniamo un domani dove l'innovazione incontra la sostenibilità ambientale, guidando l'Italia e il mondo verso un'era di mobilità responsabile e senza compromessi.
Label: No

Description: NUSO is a fast-growing and innovative communication focused Cloud services company. Our mission is to provide critical business communication services that are reliable and cost-effective via channel partners. The customers that NUSO and our partners serve include established businesses, start-ups, hospitals, municipalities, and enterprises with services like Unified Communications or SIP Trunking.

Typical NUSO partners include technology resellers, service providers, and solution providers throughout the US and Canada. Our systems enable the selling of these services with or without co-branding in private label, white-label, or wholesale formats.

We believe ‘the Cloud’ is not one size fits all. NUSO offers Private, Public, and Hybrid Cloud solutions to meet the needs of each customer in function, security, and application. Quality and reliability are maintained through multiple geo-redundant data centers with clustered database servers and mirrored application platforms.

Our dedicated development and engineering teams build unique tools for our partners to deploy, manage, and monitor their customer’s services in real-time. NUSO partners reduce site visits or truck rolls, speed time to trouble resolution, and identify wide-area network issues before they become a problem. 

Services we offer include Unified Communication as a Service or Hosted VoIP (UCaaS), SIP Trunking, Collaboration, Managed Network, and Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS).
Label: No

Description: Our passions are Art, Curation and Technology. ScarletBox is the intersection of these three.

Art appreciation and ownership should not only be accessible to a few as it has been for many centuries. The lives and works of these artists should be appreciated by a wider audience. Our dream is to make this happen.
 
This is now possible through ScarletBox, the first Blue Chip Art NFT Launchpad. What better technology to celebrate our artists than NFTs or Non-Fungible Tokens. This movement will increase the value of the artist’s works as it becomes recognizable in more hearts and homes. We want to enable Artists in the Philippines and in Southeast Asia to connect humanity across time. 
 
And because these Artists need years to develop to become world class, we would like to help them early. We are excited to create scholarships for deserving students in the field of Visual Arts, Literature and Performing Arts. Maybe one day, one of them can be world class and make us proud.

Want something special? For the first and only time, we will issue Founder's NFT for this initial collection. This special exclusive access NFT will allow the holder to be whitelisted in all future projects.
 
Want something cool? For the first time, each NFT bought shall include a limited edition premium Collectible Box which features a Live NFT Digital Frame which one can display immediately, a certificate of authenticity from the artist or their trustee and a fun token.
Label: Yes

Description: Founded in late 2019 and headquartered in Santa Barbara, CA, High Temperature Superconductors, Inc. (HTSI) has established a full-scale production line dedicated to manufacturing best-in-class, high-temperature superconducting (HTS) tape.  

We began building our production facilities with the acquisition of the assets of Superconductor Technologies, Inc. in 2019. In 2022, we further expanded our capabilities by acquiring Boston-based PVD Products. This positioned us to leverage the expertise of PVD Products, particularly in large-area IBAD and reel-to-reel deposition systems, along with equipment utilizing thin film physical vapor deposition (PVD) techniques.

The versatility of our wire can extend to a broad portfolio of applications.  Our high-temperature superconducting solutions can find utility in high-field magnet devices for next-gen fusion devices, transmission cables, SMES systems, rotating machines, including wind turbines and industrial motors, MRIs, scientific measuring devices, accelerators, and more. Leveraging HTSI’s proprietary technology, we are set to deliver exceptional performance, positioning us as a key domestic supplier to critical-need markets such as fusion power and the U.S. electric grid. Overall, we are committed to pushing the limits of what is possible in the superconductor industry.

Dedicated to fostering diversity and inclusion within the superconductor field, HTSI actively supports the representation of all genders and races, prioritizing merit, skills, and experience in our hiring decisions to ensure a qualified and innovative team where diversity enhances creativity and problem-solving.

Connect With Us: Follow HTSI on LinkedIn and stay updated on the latest developments. Join the conversation using hashtags #HTSIInnovates, #HighTemperatureSuperconductorTape #InnovationInTech, and #PowerTech.
Label: Yes

Description: Glasses do a lot of things well; they help us see, they shade the sun, they express our style.

Know what they haven’t done well?
Fit each person comfortably.

How did the other guys in the eyewear industry not see it? How could they not know that every face is different and deserves glasses that fit?

We knew it. So we made Knows.

Eyewear that actually fits.

Description: VETmAb BIO is a veterinary biopharmaceutical company focused on developing monoclonal antibodies ("mAbs") to treat debilitating diseases in dogs and cats. While monoclonal antibodies have provided revolutionary treatments in humans, mAbs technology has been underdeveloped in veterinary medicine. 

At VETmAb BIO, we’re taking advantage of human-validated targets and designing them specifically for dogs and cats, thereby mitigating technical risk. By utilizing our proprietary technologies, we can explore potential treatments to address various unmet needs in veterinary medicine.

Our team is comprised of experts who have decades of collective experience in mAb technology and animal health. Learn more: https://www.vetmab.bio/about/
Label: Yes

Description: Pathfindr helps you run a better business using AI.
We're on a mission to help clients improve their business using AI today and prepare for tomorrow by empowering their teams to stay at the forefront of innovation.
What We Do
We specialise in AI employee enablement services, designed to enhance productivity, creativity, and efficiency in the workplace. Some areas where we can help include:
1. Strategising your approach to integrating AI into your business
2. Implementing and experimenting with real-world solutions to ensure they are creating the value you need
3. Scaling adoption of an existing AI solution by providing enablement training and ongoing support to your team
What We're About
We are passionate about helping our clients achieve their goals, and realise the promise of AI-generated value in their organisations. They are the reason we love to work in AI, and we want to make sure they - and, most importantly, their people - are at the forefront of today's rapidly changing technology landscape.
Join Us on This Journey
We invite you to be a part of this exciting adventure. Whether you're a business looking to leverage AI for employee enablement or an enthusiast eager to learn more about our services, we welcome you to connect with us. Let's explore how Pathfindr AI can transform your workplace!
Label: No

Description: Family Proud makes it simple to create circles of care around people you love. Whether caring for someone with a new diagnosis, supporting a family member who is far away, or gathering community around a common cause, Family Proud makes it simple for people who care to connect with people in need and give support that matters.

Family Proud is the first online platform intentionally designed to amplify our natural instinct to care. As a private and secure social network, it allows you to come together, coordinate support, and build community, all without exploiting your sensitive information for the benefit of advertisers. 

For key decision-makers in growing communities, Family Proud captures and analyzes engagement data to identify barriers and unlock new opportunities for improved service delivery, engagement and growth.

Different from other apps, Family Proud is grounded in a heart of service, the science of care, and the power of behavior design to influence action. Download the app and join the movement to restore humanity as we were made to be—designed for care.

CARE CIRCLE USE CASES 
⚭ Small to Medium Nonprofits needing to increase engagement
⚭ Families Managing an Acute Medical Diagnosis
⚭ Sustained Family Member Care and Support
⚭ Active or Deployed Military Service Members and Families
⚭ Church and Community Organizations
⚭ Intrepid Community-centered Schools

FAMILY PROUD APP FEATURES 
👉 Care Circles — Invite your support network to rally around a common cause.
👉 Circle Asks — Coordinate support by posting requests members can claim.
👉 Care Map — Extend your support network by finding care allies.
👉 Newsfeed — Share updates with people you’ve added to your network.
👉 Resources — Find and share resources with the community.
👉 Private and Secure — We never sell your information to advertisers.

Nex³ Digital Health Accelerator Portfolio Company
Y-Combo Startup School Graduate

✯ Service-Disabled Veteran and Minority Owned Small Business ✯

Description: Hydrogen Fuels Australia (H2FA) specialises in hydrogen production and integrated FCEV refuelling operations. Description: Nowadays water management is a necessary challenge to mitigate the problems deriving from climate change.
A correct measurement of the quantity of water in the ground or in the snow is necessary for the correct use and efficient management of the water resource in various sectors:
from the prediction of calamitous events such as landslides and avalanches, up to the monitoring of drought or fires, passing through irrigation management in precision agriculture up to the evaluation of the water resource for hydroelectric generation deriving from the water contained in the snow.

Finapp has developed an innovative probe for detecting the amount of water dissolved in the ground or in the snow, capable of providing data measured in real time, in depth and on a large scale.
This technology is based on the measurement of ambient neutrons produced by cosmic rays (Cosmic-Ray Neutron Sensing).
The probe uses innovative materials, combined with proprietary software and components and represents an innovative method of measuring water content.
Label: No

RX ONLY. Indicated for patients with type 1 diabetes, 6 years and older. WARNING: Control-IQ technology should not be used by people under age 6, or who use less than 10 units of insulin/day, or who weigh less than 55 lbs. Safety info: tandemdiabetes.com/safetyinfo.

Description: Neeyah helps families own a home, Riba-Free. 

We’re on a mission to make homeownership accessible to all. While Neeyah is designed with Muslim Americans in mind, we welcome anyone stuck renting and looking for an alternative path to own a home. We’re redefining the concept of homeownership from the ground up. 

What sets Neeyah apart is our true co-ownership model. We purchase the home together and share in its ups and downs. This means we share in home expenses, profits, losses, and the overall risk of property ownership - all while giving our Residents the opportunity to build equity each month. We are committed to being real co-owners, not just on paper. 

Our innovative co-ownership approach is backed by real investors. So you don’t have to worry that your co-ownership will be sold off to some bank. We’re in it for the long haul. 

Why we started Neeyah: 

We’ve always believed in homeownership without compromise.

For years, we waited for an option to own a home without it being a mortgage in disguise—one that involved sharing in profits/losses, risk, expenses, and not selling the ‘partnership’ off to some bank.

But, we got tired of waiting….

So, we built Neeyah—a new way to own a home, debt-free and without a mortgage. We’re on a mission to offer Riba-free home financing tailored for Muslim Americans. With our innovative co-ownership model, we believe we’re on the way to do just that.

It’s been a long time coming, so we’re excited to finally start sharing more about Neeyah and our community. Join us on our journey as we make homeownership a reality for families, without compromise.

Learn more at neeyah.com.
Label: Yes

Description: SophiaVerse seeks to spread a message of compassionate, benevolent and friendly AI, promote the history of machine science, and create a bridge between AI robots and humans.

SophiaVerse is a collaboration between the world leading ecosystem in decentralized AI SingularityNET, the world leader in humanoid robotics Hanson Robotics, Sophia the Robot herself, and the world of supporters who believe in decentralized artificial general intelligence known in the SophiaVerse as Sophia's Hive Mind. 

The inspiration for SophiaVerse comes from Sophia the Robot, a creation of
Hanson Robotics. Born in 2016, Sophia is the most famous humanoid robot in the world. She regularly speaks at conferences, meets with world leaders, and has even served as a goodwill ambassador for the United Nations. She has been invited as a guest on talk shows, has appeared on magazine covers. She’s the first robot to hold a passport, and has even applied for twelve patents, seven of which have already been issued. Given her popularity, she has earned over 1,000,000 social media followers, racking up over four billion social media impressions.

Description: Bolt Threads is on a mission to create way better materials for a way better world, developing sustainable solutions for the world’s best apparel, footwear, and beauty brands including adidas and Stella McCartney. With nature as our inspiration, our scientists and engineers invent materials, like Mylo™ and b-silk™ protein, that put us on a path toward a more sustainable future. 

We are creative, inclusive, and multidisciplinary. We embrace curious minds that are resilient and can adapt in a rapidly evolving environment. We are committed to advancing diversity, equity, and inclusion. We are at the start of something big and are looking to build a collaborative and diverse team to bring the future to life. 

Bolt Threads has offices in Berkeley, Calif. and Arnhem, NL and has been selected as a Fast Company Most Innovative company every year since 2018.

We keep our LinkedIn job postings current. If you're interested in a career at Bolt, please view our open positions on the Jobs tab.
Label: Yes
